mapper.delete: DELETE hws.*, htsl.*, wpr.*, hwsh.* FROM hmsg_webhook_server AS hws JOIN hmsg_template_server_line htsl ON htsl.server_code = hws.server_code LEFT JOIN webhook_project_rel wpr ON wpr.webhook_id = hws.server_id JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh hwsh ON hwsh.server_code = hws.server_code WHERE hws.server_id=#{webhookId}
mapper.select: SELECT any_value ( hws.server_id ) AS server_id, any_value ( hws.webhook_address ) AS webhook_address, any_value ( hws.server_type ) AS server_type, any_value ( hws.enabled_flag ) AS enabled_flag, any_value ( hts.message_name ) AS messageName, any_value ( hts.message_code ) AS messageCode, any_value ( hts.temp_server_id ) AS tempServerId FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws, hmsg_template_server_line htsl, hmsg_template_server hts WHERE htsl.template_code LIKE CONCAT( '%', hws.server_type, '%' ) AND hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id AND hws.enabled_flag=1 AND hws.server_id =#{webHookId} GROUP BY hts.message_code
SELECT htsw.temp_server_id FROM hmsg_webhook_server hws JOIN hmsg_template_server_wh htsw ON hws.server_code = htsw.server_code WHERE hws.server_id =#{webHookId}

select distinct wpr.project_id from webhook_project_rel wpr join hmsg_webhook_server hws on wpr.webhook_id = hws.server_id join hmsg_template_server_wh htsh on htsh.server_code = hws.server_code join hmsg_template_server_line htsl on htsl.temp_server_id = htsh.temp_server_id and ( htsl.template_code like '%JSON%' or htsl.template_code like '%DINGTALKANDWECHAT%' ) join hmsg_template_server hts on hts.temp_server_id = htsl.temp_server_id where 1=1 and hts.message_code = #{code}
